title: 88 Jim Afremow: Think, Train and Thrive with a Champion's Mind
description:
"Champions do not leave the mental game to chance or circumstance." - Jim Afremow
To learn more about the show you can get the show notes for free at LewisHowes.com/88
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
